english.segment1: She like the boys with the black hearts. She got an eye ta match. Tattoo on her neck says, "Burn bright and fast!"
english.segment2: She's a star, man. Just ask her. Light you up and take you down in flames. Tell the truth, I'm still laughing. But maybe she's your thing.
english.segment3: She comes late if she comes at all. Don't you know her name?. Picture on the bathroom wall. Jones' hall of fame!
